name: Labcodes Software Studio
tagline: High quality Python, Django and JS development
description:
Labcodes is a web development shop based in Brazil with great expertise in designing, building and scaling quality digital products.
We've been partnering with companies in US for more than 4 years and it couldn't be more successful, as you can see here: https://goo.gl/iwjU8W.
On our team, we have many different talents. Designers, Frontend and Backend Developers, and I have a dedicated team that is ready to start on a project. We're available for short-term contracts, to help you while you hire someone full time and we work pretty well on long-term contracts.
We have developers with more than 6 years of expertise in web development, API design and Agile.
Feel free to contact us at contact@labcodes.com.br to talk how we can help!
Visit our website: www.labcodes.com.br
